name: The Next Era
description:
A shooter game for BrackeysGameJam 2023.1.

Play as a gost who likes to posses people and kill. Join the gost as he travels trough time.

Big Monkey : He likes to eat bananas but if disturbed he will unleash hell upon you.

Shopkeeper : He might look like a innocent shopkeeper but he has some bullets for the ones who challenges him.

Weird Robot : Nobody knows what It is after, It can form Skynet before It completes Its mission DESTROY It.

Controls :

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move.

Right Click to Attack.

Left Shift to Dash.

R to Change Weapons.

Thanks to https://itch.io/profile/savuzyelim for making the assets and helping me code. Do not forget to write your score in the comments.
